titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Elias Fulp Papers, 1872-1908 and undated RL.00425
titlestmt.author: David Romine, Meghan Lyon

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-10-20 11:31:02 -0400.

change.item: Converted from dtd to schema, transformed with AT-import-fixer.xsl, and imported to Archivists Toolkit
Updated housing and assigned volume numbers.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Elias Fulp was a physician from Walnut Cove, North Carolina. Postmaster of Fulp, North Carolina. The collection consists of correspondence and other papers pertaining to Fulp's role as trustee for Sidney H. Reid, who had just gone into bankruptcy. There are also several account books with accounts of a physician's practice.
did.physdesc: 3 individual volumes (Volumes 1-3); 1 box holding 5 additional volumes (Volumes 4-8) and 3 folders.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: However, collection may contain materials to which the Acknowledgment of Legal Responsibilities and Privacy Rights form applies. Patrons must sign this form before using this collection.
Also, all or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. Consequently, there may be a 24-hour delay in obtaining these materials.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Elias Fulp Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Elias Fulp Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 1956.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Encoded by Jennifer Snow and Carrie Mills, May 2011
Accession(s) described in this finding aid: 56-137, 56-234
Updated by David Romine, Meghan Lyon, Oct. 2017

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of correspondence and other papers pertaining to Fulp's role as trustee for Sidney H. Reid, who had just gone into bankruptcy. There are also several account books with accounts of a physician's practice.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection's Volumes 1-3 are individually boxed and barcoded. Volumes 4-8 are all held in Box 1. All folders are also held in Box 1.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Personal and professional correspondence related to life and professional practice of Dr. Fulp.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp, includes names of individuals, dates of visits and calls, and payment received or owed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp, includes names of individuals, dates of visits and calls, and payment received or owed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp with names of debtors and creditors with dates of debits and credits.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp, includes names of individuals, dates of visits and calls, and payment received or owed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp with names of debtors and creditors with dates of debits and credits.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp, includes names of individuals, dates of visits and calls, and payment received or owed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ledger for practice of Dr. Fulp, includes names of individuals, dates of visits and calls, and payment received or owed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, receipts, payment stubs, and legal documents relating to Dr. Fulp's role as trustee for S.H. Reid during bankruptcy proceedings for the latter's general store.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Notice of trustee sale for assets of S.H. Reid and fragment of ledger.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Fragment of a ledger containing names but no account information
